welcomePage.title: FIS Application Studio
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with the FIS Application Studio. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: What is FIS Application Studio FIS Application Studio is a fully integrated development environment for developing functionality in FIS Profile. To find out more about the features installed in your workbench, choose Help > Welcome... and select the feature you are interested in.
What's New in 3.0 Learn about the new feature in version 3.0 in the Profile Development User Guide
FIS Profile Perspective The default perspective contains views geared toward FIS Profile Development. To learn more about these features you can browse the Profile Development User Guide.

PSL Development Developing in Profile Scripting Language (PSL) has never been easier. On-line help is embedded in the FIS Application Studio. You can access this through the Help menu, or directly at PSL Help.
FIS Programming Standards You can browse FIS Programming Standards to learn about standards and guidelines for programming Profile applications.

Eclipse Platform The FIS Application Studio is built on Eclipse Technology. This means you have all the power of Eclipse in addition to features specifically tailored for FIS Application development.
To learn more you can browse the Workbench User Guide.
